title: Which character do you start off with in Cyberpunk 2077? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m probably going nomad at the start. The nomad from outside the city so i imagine won’t have much insider knowledge much like myself. Unsure on class/build but not very interested in melee or netrunning(which i view as more of a stealth style playthrough) so i’ll probably go techie and or solider depending on what skills i use and what appeals to me as i play.
